author: sky.cactus
content: <@474322772806467600> miner_bribe would need to be bumped by 12.5%.  Bumping base_fee doesn't actually mean you pay more, and for DoS protection we need the person to pay for replace by fee.

author: barnabemonnot
content: You might also need to change `fee_cap`. For instance my first bid is 5 Gwei bribe, 10 Gwei max fee. I could replace the bribe to 6 Gwei, then 7 etc. even beyond 10 Gwei. Since the miner would get the minimum between the bribe and `fee_cap - basefee`, it doesn't matter if I replace the bribe to 11, 12, 13 etc. while fee cap is still at 10 (unless miners disregard transactions where bribe > fee cap?)
